rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with Vastu compliant direction to greet the family and visitors. It has a central seating arrangement, storage for shoes and outerwear.

Large open-plan living room combined with kitchen. The design follows Colonial aesthetics with vintage decor elements and modern amenities. The layout is optimized to capture natural light from the East and West.
Seating area for family meals, designed with ample space and comfortable seating arrangements.
Master bedroom with attached ensuite bathroom. Vastu guidelines suggest placing the master bedroom in the north or east direction to ensure peace and prosperity.
Guest or family bedroom designed for privacy, adhering to colonial aesthetics with adequate ventilation and natural light.
Additional bedroom with space for joint family members.
Family bedroom designed to promote harmony within the household.
Bedroom allocated for other family members, ensuring comfort and privacy.

Dedicated home theater room designed with soundproofing and comfortable seating arrangements. The positioning adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring a quiet area away from the main traffic corridors.
Guest room that can serve as extra bedroom when needed, designed for flexibility.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned in the north to align with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Secondary exit towards the west side of the house.
Large window designed to allow maximum natural light in accordance with colonial design.
Window on the west side ensuring cross ventilation, keeping Vastu principles in mind for balanced energy.
Skylight in the open plan living and kitchen area to enhance natural light and ventilation.

floor_plan_description: The design is a Colonial single-story 6BHK farmhouse covering 4000 sqft. The plan incorporates an open-plan living and kitchen area with ample natural light, a home theater, multiple bedrooms designed for joint family usage, and Vastu-aligned placements including entrances and openings.

vastu_considerations.bedroom_locations: Master bedroom in north/east; other bedrooms placed with adequate spacing
vastu_considerations.home_theater: Located away from main corridors for optimal acoustics and minimal disturbance
